title: The ultimate guide to AEO: How to get ChatGPT to recommend your product | Ethan Smith (Graphite)
key_insights: AEO requires being mentioned frequently across citations rather than just ranking #1, unlike traditional SEO
Early-stage companies can win at AEO quickly through citations, whereas SEO typically requires established domain authority
LLM traffic converts 6x better than Google search traffic due to higher intent and conversational priming
Reddit optimization works best through authentic participation rather than spam - identify as yourself and provide genuine value
AI-generated content doesn't work for ranking - only 10-12% of top results are AI-generated despite 50%+ of web content being AI-created
The 'long tail' of questions is much larger in chat (25 words avg) vs search (6 words), creating new opportunities
Help center optimization is crucial for AEO since people ask specific feature/integration questions
Answer tracking requires measuring share of voice across multiple LLMs and question variants, not just single rankings
topics_discussed: Definition and differences between AEO and GEO
ChatGPT vs traditional Google search traffic quality
Citation optimization across YouTube, Reddit, affiliates
Answer tracking tools and measurement strategies
Experiment design with control groups for AEO
AI-generated content study results and effectiveness
Model collapse and wisdom of crowds in AI systems
Help center optimization for long-tail questions
Landing page creation for question targeting
Video content opportunities in B2B niches
Team structure and hiring for AEO success
memorable_quotes: You are playing the game whether you want to or not, so you might as well try to show up. If you just say, 'Don't look at any of my data,' then you cannot show up and your competitors will.
Early-stage companies can win, they can win quickly... You can have a Reddit thread, you can have a YouTube video... They could show up in an answer tomorrow.
There's more AI-generated content on the internet than human-generated content, which is disturbing.
frameworks_mentioned: Citation categorization (onsite, video, UGC, affiliates, blogs)
Information gain and typicality content scoring
Share of voice measurement across LLMs
recommended_for: Growth marketers and heads of growth
Startup founders focused on organic growth
summary: Ethan Smith provides a comprehensive guide to Answer Engine Optimization (AEO), explaining how to get products featured in ChatGPT and other AI responses through citation optimization, authentic community engagement, and strategic content creation. He debunks myths about AI-generated content while offering a practical 7-step framework for winning in this emerging channel.
